RETRY_COOLDOWN_DESCRIPTION: Please wait before trying again. Take a break and come back in:
HELP_IN_FINDING_NEW_LEVELS: I've added as many levels as I could find. I'd appreciate any help in finding the rest.
ASK_RESET_ALL_PROGRESS: Are you sure you want to reset all progress?
RESET_PROGRESS_DESCRIPTION: This will reset all your completed levels and progress. This action cannot be undone.
PWA_INSTALL_BANNER_DESCRIPTION: Show prompts to install the app on your device
PWA_OFFLINE_SUPPORT_DESCRIPTION: Cache app content for offline use (requires page refresh)
PWA_SETTINGS_REFRESH_REQUIRED: Please refresh the page for the changes to take effect.
GAME_GOAL_INSTRUCTION: Your goal is to have <1>exactly one</1> <2 /> in each <3> row, column, and color region.</3>
TAPS_INSTRUCTION: Tap once to place X and tap twice for <1 />. Use X to mark where <2 /> cannot be placed.
TOUCH_DIAGONAL_QUEENS_INSTRUCTION: Two <1 /> cannot touch each other, not even diagonally.
PAST_IMAGE_MSG: Try pasting an image. The bigger and as specific the image, the better.
SHARE_LEVEL_SCREENSHOT_LINK: If you have a screenshot of the level, please share it <1>here</1> or reach out directly.
PAGE_YOU_ARE_LOOKING_FOR_DOESNT_EXIST: Oops! The page you're looking for doesn't exist.

INSTALL_APP_PROMPT: Install Queens Game for a better experience
INSTALL_APP_SAFARI_MAC_INSTRUCTIONS: To install: Click the Share button in Safari's toolbar (square with arrow pointing up), then select 'Add to Dock'
INSTALL_APP_CHROME_INSTRUCTIONS: To install: Click the three-dot menu in Chrome's toolbar, then select 'Install Queens Game...'
STREAK_NOTIFICATIONS_BLOCKED: Notifications are blocked. Please enable them in your browser settings.
STREAK_NOTIFICATIONS_DESCRIPTION: Get daily reminders at 9am and 9pm to maintain your streak
STREAK_REMINDERS_ENABLED_DESC: Receive notifications to keep your streak alive
STREAK_REMINDERS_DENIED_DESC: Notifications blocked. Enable in browser settings to receive reminders.
STREAK_REMINDERS_PERMISSION_DESC: Enable notifications to receive daily streak reminders
STREAK_PERMISSION_DENIED_HELP: To enable notifications, go to your browser settings and allow notifications for this site, then refresh the page.
